about_the_game:
Choose your spirit animal.
Relic is a treasure adventure quest where you search and dig for treasure.

Don't treasure hunt alone.

Gain loot, obtain wearable outfits, complementary companions, motions such as dances, and emotions to show your feelings on treasure hunting to your friends in multiplayer mode, and find the Relics to traverse the different terrains of The Island!

Customize your treasure hunter

Customize your player character from their skin color, eye color, and hair color.
Collect swag to customize your character even further.
Equip different combinations at any time depending on the mood.
Earn the ability to ride along in treasure hunts with your spirit animal.
Show off that sweet swag.

Play your way

Level up to gain attribute points for your spirit animal.
Invest in dig speed, dig power, or movement speed depending on your play style.

Quick play

Each match is one minute long.
How many treasures can be obtained within the time limit?
Reach the MAXIMUM BONUS!

Single-player treasure hunting glory

Are you a lone treasure hunter?
Then this mode is for you!
All treasures are obtainable in single-player mode.

Cross-platform multiplayer treasure hunting

Play with friends, even across platforms!
The more friends in a treasure hunting party, the more rewards gained.
Progress is saved online, so Relic can be played on-the-go!

Vibrant environments

Treasure hunt in different settings.
Each terrain has a different set of treasures to find!

Over 150 treasures to obtain

Can you obtain them all?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.4 LTS
  • Processor: i7 ~3 Ghz / Ryzen 7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ventura 13.6.6
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
